summary: Implement cohort analysis with time-decaying weight for retention tracking in a SaaS analytics platform. System must support custom cohort creation based on signup dates/events, automatic cohort updates, adjustable time-decay functions (exponential/linear), and visualizations including trend lines and heatmaps. Key constraints: integrate with existing analytics datastore, maintain dashboard performance (≤20% load time increase), handle duplicate cohort memberships, and provide user warnings for aggressive decay parameters. Deliverables include CSV/PDF export functionality and comprehensive documentation.
